snippet: New-Orleans papers of the 30th ult. bring detailed accounts of the recent outbreak and rebellion against the Mexican Government in the Northern Departments. All the intelligence concerning the engagement between the two forces is comprised in the ...
lead_paragraph: New-Orleans papers of the 30th ult. bring detailed accounts of the recent outbreak and rebellion against the Mexican Government in the Northern Departments. All the intelligence concerning the engagement between the two forces is comprised in the following letters from The Rio Bravo of the 24th, published at Brownsville, Texas:

headline.main: FROM NORTHERN MEXICO.; PROGRESS OF THE REVOLUTION. BATTLE AT CAMRGO. SUCCESS OFTHE PATRIOTS
